    • Method Detail

      • checkPasswordValidity

        public boolean checkPasswordValidity(String name,
                                     String password)
                              throws SQLException
        Used to check if a given name and password pair matches any user in the database
        Parameters:
        name - String representing the username
        password - String representing the supposed password matching the given username
        Returns:
        boolean - True if the given name and password matches that of an existing user, False otherwise
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getUserWithInvoices

        public Model_User getUserWithInvoices(int userID)
                               throws SQLException
        Used to fetch a user from the database. This method returns a user object based on the given ID. The user object will contain invoices. The invoices will not contain any details
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the chosen user
        Returns:
        Model_User
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getUser

        public Model_User getUser(int userID)
                   throws SQLException
        Used to fetch a user from the database. This method returns a user object based on the given ID. The user object will not contain invoices.
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the chosen user
        Returns:
        Model_User
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • updateBalance

        public void updateBalance(int userID,
                          double balance)
                   throws SQLException
        Used to update the balance of a given user. This method will update the balance of a user if the given userID matches an ID in the database.
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the chosen user
        balance - A double representing the amount of money that should either be added or removed from the user
        Throws:
        SQLException
